channel.title: Need npc help
channel.description: hi, how can i a npc let say nc online or when i'm offline nc offline or buy your randoms itesm here orso thank you.

where in npchandler to add that?

item.title: Need npc help
item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

                   if (npcs[i].npcType == ****) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) // this is the time delay
                        {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("NC")) {
                                npcs[i].textUpdate = "NC is ONLINE";
                            } else {
                                npcs[i].textUpdate = "NC is OFFLINE";
                            }
                        }
                    }

Read full topic

item.title: Need npc help
item.dc:creator: @josh555 josh555
item.description:
@josh555 wrote:

[quote=“josh555, post:2, topic:198941”]it has to be in npchandler.java. Here is an example:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 530) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Rare Shop!"; } }[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Need npc help
item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

First you need to add the npc to autospawn.cfg, then open you’re npchandler.java and add this with the you’re npc id in the first ****

                   if (npcs[i].npcType == ****) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) // this is the time delay
                        {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("*****")) {
                                npcs[i].textUpdate = "***** is ONLINE";
                            } else {
                                npcs[i].textUpdate = "***** is OFFLINE";
                            }
                        }
                    }

Read full topic

item.title: Need npc help
item.dc:creator: @josh555 josh555
item.description:
@josh555 wrote:

it has to be in npchandler.java. Here is an example:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 530) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Rare Shop!"; } }

Read full topic
